Articles.Content:
Often I've found myself spinning in circles looking for my target during a rendezvous, the blue arrow was a great addition to the Navigation Ball and I think Radar might be very helpful as well, I would see this giving us a tracking on objects at a further distance and showing a 360 or 180 view around the craft. The picture below is just an idea of what it could look like. Other Suggestions and Comments are welcome!

![Oh1wLbN.png](%5Bimg%5Dhttp%3A//i.imgur.com/Oh1wLbN.png)

Not quite sure what you mean. IICR, the little markers which show where other things are can be seen through the ship. Or maybe that was only ones you have set as a target.

> 
> Not quite sure what you mean. IICR, the little markers which show where other things are can be seen through the ship. Or maybe that was only ones you have set as a target.

When switching from the Orbital Map during a rendezvous with another craft or space station the craft is often not at center view of the screen and I am often searching the stars for the craft, the radar could indicate if it were underneath my craft or on top to help find the craft. Also the yellow targeted craft is sometimes hard to spot from a distance. The Radar could also show other crafts in orbit around the Planet or Mun. This feature may not better the game much but make it look a little more technical on the view screen giving more information of distant objects.
